id.description: Unique alphanumeric string that identifies a data pipeline.

riskLevels.description:
The severity levels to include in the results. 

Requests must include at least one severity level.

hasDetail.description: Parameter that allows you to retrieve detailed logs from the Observed Attack Techniques data pipeline.

description.description: Notes or comments about the pipeline

If-Match.description:
Parameter that allows you to update an existing resource.

Note: To get an ETag, send a GET request to the API
